verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: When] [ARG1: President Donald Trump and first lady Melania Trump] [V: arrived] [ARG4: on the White House South Lawn] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday morning] [ARGM-PRP: to formally welcome French President Emmanuel Macron and his wife , Brigitte] , one thing was clear : The first lady commanded attention .
